category: Other Disease of Public Health Importance

case_definition.suspected: Unexplained rash with fever and one or more of headache, lymphadenopathy, myalgia, or fatigue.
case_definition.probable: Suspected case with exposure to confirmed case or animal vector.
case_definition.confirmed: Positive PCR for Orthopoxvirus or Monkeypox virus.

public_health_actions: Isolate case and initiate contact tracing
Collect lesion sample for lab confirmation
Notify NCDC and deploy rapid response team
